item.title: The NRF240L1 RF Transceiver
item.description: This RC reciever chip is very easy to use out of the box, yet provides some very sophisticated capabilities. The first project We’ll start using this chip will be a remote control Joystick for our mobile robot. Todos: point to the datasheet load personal photos of my project with NRF20L pull the image from evernote fritz a diagram post code that I use and or wrote Try to do an eagle cad Source Voltage According to Benjamin David Fraser Plugging the NRF24L02 directly into the Arduino 3.
